value.title: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps
value.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps. Use Visual Studio Code to create and run the web app locally.

value.title: Query, visualize, and monitor data in Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Describe how to query, visualize, and monitor data in Azure Sentinel.

value.title: React to state changes in your Azure services by using Event Grid
value.excerpt: Build a serverless application architecture, automate your operations, and integrate applications by handling Azure events with Event Grid.

value.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
value.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

value.title: Manage software delivery by using a release based workflow on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to implement a release based workflow on GitHub using project boards, branches, and releases.

value.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Find out about the Azure Batch capabilities designed to help you efficiently run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications in the cloud.

value.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
value.excerpt: AP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non -shared host/server bare -metal hardware.

value.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
value.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Start the machine learning lifecycle with MLOps
value.excerpt: Learn enterprise AI management with our free open online course, including machine learning.

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: Approach your data-flow diagram with the right threat model focus
value.excerpt: Threat modeling is an effective technique to help you identify threats and ways to reduce or eliminate risk. We start by deciding to focus on either what needs to be protected or who it needs protection from.

value.title: Create a threat model using data-flow diagram elements
value.excerpt: Data-flow diagrams are graphical representations of your system and should specify each element, their interactions and context.

value.title: Introduction to threat modeling
value.excerpt: Explore the four high-level steps of threat modeling.

value.title: Provide context with the right depth layer
value.excerpt: Threat models can get complex if all parties involved cannot agree on a data-flow diagram depth layer that provides enough context to satisfy requirements

value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

value.title: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks

value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. For more information, see: What is Managed Service Identity (MSI) for Azure resources? (docs): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-service-identity/overview
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bBi1bll2928" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Automation | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jenny Hunter joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Automation, which has seen several new improvements including support for Python 2, the ability to run against local Linux machines, the ability to run against any Azure VM with no setup (Run Command), and native Azure alert integration. [03:27] Demo

value.title: Azure Container Instances (ACI) under the hood | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Have you ever wondered what's going on under the hood for serverless offerings like Azure Container Instances? MacKenzie Olson shows Scott Hanselman the latest innovations in the infrastructure that powers ACI and a peek at the product roadmap, including a demo of the managed identity experience coming

value.title: Azure Container Registry Tasks: Build and deploy to Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Steve Lasker joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Azure Container Registry (ACR) Tasks and how you can build your container images in Azure for the three phases of development: pre-commit, team commits, and post-development for OS & Framework Patching. value.title: Azure Friday | Azure App Service with Hybrid Connections to On-premises Resources
value.excerpt: Christina Compy joins Scott Hanselman to talk about the recently relaunched App Service Hybrid Connections. This feature enables your apps in the App Service to reach resources on other networks. Those other networks can be in Azure, on-premises or networks in other cloud providers.   Azure App Service

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Even though Azure takes three copies of your virtual machines and stores them in Azure Storage, you still need to protect your data against ransomware, corruption, or accidental deletion. Kelly Anderson stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about how simple it is to set up Azure Backup, how its built-in

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure CDN: Dynamic Site Acceleration

value.title: Azure Friday | Serverless APIs with Azure Function Proxies
value.excerpt: Alex Karcher joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure Function Proxies, the serverless API toolbox. Proxies give you a truly serverless experience to manage your APIs with dynamic billing and scaling, and a super simple setup process. value.title: Best way to start Power Apps for a non-professional developer? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Sometimes services like Power Apps can be daunting. In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar shares some tips for getting started and explains why you do not have to be a professional developer to use Power Apps.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/modules/get-started-with-powerapps/?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-donasa
